oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 9 lines per page, in black.
According to the colophon (f. 12r), copy completed between 1280 AH [1863 or 4 AD].
From the books of Abū al-Ḥusayn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad.
With this is bound: Risālah fī bayān ḥadīth ikhtilāf al-ummah / Muḥammad Ṣibghat Allāh al-Madrāsī (ff. 13r-37v).
MS Arab SM4344. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
